description: A tomboyish pheromone and other odor composition user who acts as a beast handler at the gourmet Coliseum, a fighting ring run by IGO that pits beast against each other to both validate the accuracy of CLVL rankings and as entertainment for world officials, her nickname is "the wild beast tamer." She has a crush on Toriko as shown when she heard he was at the Coliseum she busily began applying makeup. She is the younger sister of one of the Four Heavenly Kings, Sani. She blushes whenever Toriko talks to her (even if he just says her name) or does something kind. She seems to have a weakness for sweets. She is protective of Toriko, as shown when Sani touches his cheek and comments on his skin and Rin gets flustered and tells Sani not to touch Toriko. She also seems to have been implanted with Gourmet Cells.
name: Rin
